title: Hebrew, Arabic, Romanian & Ukrainian Language Support
summary: Frames for macOS continues expanding language support with Hebrew, Arabic, Romanian, and Ukrainian, alongside interface refinements for a smoother metadata reintegration workflow.

sections.content: This update brings native support for Hebrew and Arabic with full right-to-left interface adaptation, plus Romanian and Ukrainian translations. All language-specific terminology for film stocks, camera settings, and EXIF metadata has been carefully localized to ensure consistency with the iOS app.

sections.alt: Frames macOS app with Hebrew and Arabic RTL interface and language support

improvements: Added Hebrew (עברית) localization with right-to-left interface support
Added Arabic (العربية) localization with RTL layout adaptation
Interface refinements for smoother user experience
Improved consistency across all supported languages

fixes.title: GPS Coordinates
fixes.description: Fixed an issue where GPS longitude values were reversed (East/West) in the Western Hemisphere when exporting DNG or RAW files.
